mapper.select: select * from reboard order by boardGroup desc, boardSequence asc
mapper.insert: insert into reboard(idx,memId, title, contents, writer, boardGroup, boardSequence,boardLevel,boardAvailable) select IFNULL(max(idx)+1,1) ,#{memId},#{title},#{contents},#{writer}, IFNULL(max(boardGroup)+1,0),0,0,1 from reboard
mapper.update: update reboard set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from member where memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
mapper.update: update reboard set boardSequence=boardSequence+1 where boardGroup=#{boardGroup} and boardSequence > #{boardSequence}
